features: 👑【EASY INSTALLATION】 The screen protector is specially designed for iPhone 8 Plus /iPhone 7 Plus 5.5 inch screen, 100% touch accurate. It's a three-pack and comes with an auto-alignment installation frame for effortless adhesion. Super easy to install!

👑【ANTI-SCRATCH & IMPACT PROTECTION】 UNBREAKcable iPhone 8 Plus/7 Plus glass screen protector is made with reinforced technology. The tempered glass protector can effectively protect your iPhone from unwanted scuffs and scratches by knife, keys and some other hard substances.

👑【BUBBLE-FREE & ANTI-FINGERPRINT】 The iPhone 8 Plus/7 Plus tempered glass screen protector will self-expel air bubble when automatically bonding with the screen. Coated with hydrophobic and oleophobic clear layers on the glass protector can against oil residue from fingerprints from long-term use.

👑【99.99% HD CLEAR】 Ultra-thin and ultra-clear material makes it retain amazing clarity for viewing experience. High-quality design and engineering, durable tempered glass to deliver the brightness, sharpness, and detail you expect from your phone screen. The visual experience is comparable to the device itself because of the crystal-clear protective layer.

👑【WHAT YOU GET】UNBREAKcable Shatterproof Tempered Glass 3 pack, Easy Installation frame, 3 wet wipes, 3 dust absorbers, 4 dust stickers, lint-free cloth, detailed installation guide, 36-month warranty and easy-to-reach customer service at no additional cost. UNBREAKcable Support Team is always stand by your side to help.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: If you meet any problems below when you are using UNBREAKcable iPhone 8 Plus / iPhone 7 Plus Screen Protector, we will send you a New One: Broken/CrackAir bubblesDoesn't fit your phoneMissing Acessories

Warm Reminder: Designed for iPhone 8 Plus (2017) / iPhone 7 Plus (2016) 5.5inch. Please confirm your phone model before you purchase. What are the features? Super easy installation, 9H hardness, Shatterproof, Shockproof, Anti-scratches, Anti-fingerprints, HD(99.99% transparency), bubble-free, etc. These features make the UNBREAKcable screen protector the best shield for your iPhone screen. How drop-resistant are our UNBREAKcable iPhone 8 Plus/7 Plus screen protectors? Every single piece of the UNBREAKcable iPhone 8 Plus/7 Plus screen protector has passed a 9H pencil test and a 10.4 kg / 23 lbs pressure test. As a result, this tempered glass screen protector keeps your display intact and flawless daily, preventing any scratches, scrapes or cracks. Frequently Asked Questions Q1: What is the specialty of this screen protector compared with much cheaper ones? A1: Our screen protector made with superior 9H tempered glass is highly durable and scratch-resistant, reinforced to be twice as strong as other ordinary tempered films on the market. 10s Super-easy Installed Auto Alignment Kit makes your installation easier than ever. This screen protector utilizes automatic adsorption technology to ensure that no bubbles can exist during the installation process. Q2: How can I get rid of bubbles? A2: Please clean the screen before installing. If there are still unwanted bubbles after installing: For big bubbles: Slowly lift one corner of the screen protector to eliminate them, then re-position the protector in place.For tiny bubbles: Use the lint-free cloth provided to gently smooth them toward the closest edge of the glass protector.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Iphone Screen Proctor
reviews.reviewText: With several attempts to set the proctor on as the instructions suggested, I finally just left it on. There are 3 areas where there is air pocket, and I will make another attempt to correct this again. It seems to be a good proctor. I just need to work on it later.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not all that it's CRACKED up to be
reviews.reviewText: Disappointed as it states it's UNBREAKABLE, but the first time I dropped my phone there is a long crack on the screen protector. Certainly didn't perform as stated!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Incomplete product description
reviews.reviewText: Two issues: (1) Cannot remove all bubbles even after repeated use of dust sticker and dust absorber and edge of credit card. (2) Screen protector guidance frame is not usable as it does not fit inside frame of protective leather case (not included with product). This could have be a caution added to product description.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 7, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Die Schutzfolien sind echt klasse. Bin gerade voll begeistert :D ich lasse meine Schutzfolien sonst immer von meinem Bruder drauf machen, weil ich das nicht kann (immer schief oder es sind Fusseln auf dem Display). Bei diesen Folien ist der kleine Helfer dabei, damit es auch wirklich gerade wird.. ich bin voll glücklich, dass es so easy war :D und keine Fusseln drunter 😁dazu ist der Preis auch wirklich Top 👍🏻Wenn meine 3 Folien "aufgebraucht" sind, kaufe ich diese wieder 💪🏻
